PurchasedSchematicDelegate.description: Called when we players are granted a schematic.

PaidOffOnSchematicDelegate.description: Called when a payment on a schematic occurs

mAllSchematics.description: All schematic assets that have been sucked up in the PopulateSchematicsList function. Contains cheats and all sort of schematic.

mAvailableSchematics.description: All schematics that are available to the player

mPurchasedSchematics.description: Once schematic is purchased it ends up here

mPaidOffSchematic.description: This keeps track of what players have paid off on different schematics

mActiveSchematic.description: The active schematic the resources is being sold towards.

mOnActiveSchematicChanged.description: Called when we the schematic has been changed .

mShipLandTimeStamp.description: Time stamp for when the ship is gonna land back at the Trading Post.

mShipLandTimeStampSave.description: Used to save the ship land timestamp

mShipReturnedMessage.description: Message sent when trading post ship has returned
